title: Bank of England Sees Rising Financial Risks From AI and Lending
description: The Bank of England said on Tuesday that threats to Britain’s financial system had risen this year due to stretched valuations of companies investing in artificial intelligence, risky lending and bets with borrowed money in government bond markets. The commen…
